NPCS:

They had come from a far a way in a starship named "Mephilis" from a=
 plather this other one. The suvivors had met all pain and destrution that =
wars, Even thd Great War, had brought. But, they hoped to find there the fr=
eedom that their masters had deneided them.  They are from all knowing fact=
ions and builds; and in spite of all those years, they weren't able to forg=
et their past whose still haunted them.  When they arrived to That Planet, =
thier civilitation stated araise amd cities started to be constructed, with=
 them the mistrust and old hatres. Diving those that supostly have to be jo=
ined.

THe Earth-cities were a mirrowed of they beliefs and ancestral heir:=


Olimpus Complex whas the mnilitary heart of the Planet, this place is whe=
re Iron Skull Predacons ruled by Lord Jottunn made vailably the weaponry an=
d the traibnning Facilities. Olimpos Complex was the opposite of Pacificus =
Maximal's city, Atlantis,  whose was located in an ancient Island and it wa=
s crowed with tall towers and advanced labs where  they followed a wise Lea=
der, Lord Perseus.

Other important faction in this game of power was Bushi=
do Predacon, whose leader, Lady Spire ruled the minin city of Valley Mine P=
entraton, one of the most industrial cities in the world and one of the mos=
t culturaly universal, but is was at the same time, the city where shady bu=
ssines was  found a secure refuge. That's no happen in  Relay, the Sky city=
, where the lords meet and vote and where a Central Goverment is seated and=
 corporations are based. That was the proud city of Lord Razorwing, Silverw=
ing's Leader 

But a place where ever factions could be get along without m=
ajor problems was Cryonosis, Watchers' city and leader by Lord Elder, which=
 are inthe the hazarous Antartic. This city has the last word in technology=
 and watcher are a proud minion-killers

Those poruds warriors where the ma=
in characters of a new era of battles.
